hi all this is my first ever post and I would just like to ask if anyone out there could make a mod for MAG BOOTS / magnetic boots for kerbal eva suits seems as we have a syfy mod I seem to be wondering ? why no one has thought of having a switchable mag boot mod for eva suits....

sorry if this has already been done but I haven't found it if it has lol

hope someone will try to make this a working mod

Edited January 20, 2015 by Claw

You lurked for 3 years before posting this? impressive.

It would be cool, though I have trouble getting my kerbal to rotate on eva(try to do a front flip). If they implemented it that would be nice, especially for orbital platforms.
I like this idea a lot.

Definetly a nice idea.

Tethers would also be good, but I have no idea if the engine is able to handle a long flexible string.
